newsitem.title: HONDURAS: Honduras promotes coffee sales in China, Russia.
newsitem.headline: Honduras promotes coffee sales in China, Russia.

text.p: Honduras is trying to open up China and Russia to its coffee exports, a spokesman for the Honduran Coffee Institute said Friday.
"We are promoting sales of coffee in China and Russia, giving free supplies to airlines, travel agencies and state offices," spokesman Milton Mateo told Reuters.
"We are doing this as part of the policies adopted by producer nations in search of new markets for our coffee."
Russia and China "can become important markets for our coffee in the future," he added.
Mateo said Honduras would send a delegation to London next week for a meeting of the Association of Coffee Producing Countries but would be taking no firm proposals.
"Our country is taking no definite proposals, (but) if anything is presented to us there we will take a position," he said.
